com.eemi.ext4j.client.data

Class NodeInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eemi.ext4j.client.core.JsObject
      • com.eemi.ext4j.client.data.BaseModel
        • com.eemi.ext4j.client.data.NodeInterface

  • public class NodeInterface
extends BaseModel
    This class is used as a set of methods that are applied to the prototype of a DataModel to decorate it with a Node API. This means that models used in conjunction with a tree will have all of the tree related methods available on the model. In general this class will not be used directly by the developer. This class also creates extra fields on the model if they do not exist, to help maintain the tree state and UI. These fields are documented as config options.

    • Method Detail

      • expand

        public void expand()

      • bubble

        public void bubble(BubbleHandler handler)
        Bubbles up the tree from this node, calling the specified function with each node. The arguments to the function will be the args provided or the current node. If the function returns false at any point, the bubble is stopped.
        Parameters:
        handler - , the handler to be called when traversing each node
